ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Fundamental mathematics (e.g., algebra, ratios, geometry, trigonometry)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Fundamental statistics (e.g., mean, median, confidence intervals, distributions, probabilities, sample sizes)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Fundamental biology concepts (e.g., anatomy, physiology, basic medical terms, cells, genetic mutations, DNA)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Fundamental biology concepts (e.g., anatomy, physiology, basic medical terms, cells, genetic mutations, DNA)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Fundamental chemistry concepts (e.g., pH and balancing equations, organic and inorganic, reactivity, corrosive properties, compatibility, periodic table)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic business financial terminology (e.g., interest rates, loss rates, return on investment, depreciation, opportunity costs, budget, present and future value)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic concepts related to economic effects of losses (e.g., cost per person, incident, mile, or unit; direct and indirect costs)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Benchmarking procedures and standards (e.g., key performance indicators, standard deviation, industry comparisons)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Qualitative data collection and analysis (e.g., perception surveys, focus groups)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Quantitative measures to track and report performance (e.g., number of audits planned versus completed; training planned versus completed)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Fundamental Math and Science and Business Calculations/Analysis - Skill to:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Calculate performance metrics (e.g., incidence rates, injury rates, key performance indicators)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Incident investigation practices or processes

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Job hazard analysis (e.g., PHA)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: The difference between leading and lagging indicators and appropriate use of each

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Audit processes and practices (e.g., follow checklist or flow chart, interview, document findings, verification follow up)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Interview techniques for conducting investigations or process improvement

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: When to consult with equipment manufacturers, suppliers, or subject matter experts

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Relevant international safety, health, environmental and security standards, guidelines, and best practices (e.g., ISO standards)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Processes for continuous improvement (e.g., six sigma, lean management systems, streamlining work, product substitution, sustainability, reducing waste)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic concepts of process safety management

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic concepts of hazardous waste management

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Globally Harmonized System of classification and labeling of chemicals (GHS) (e.g., labels, safety data sheets, pictograms, signal words)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Behavior-based safety principles

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Fundamental elements of risk analysis techniques (e.g., root cause analysis; requirements matrix/gap analysis methods)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Fundamental risk management concepts (e.g., risk transfer, insure, loss control)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 -  Safety, Health, and Environmental Programs & Risk Management - Skill to:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Assess external and internal risks to facilities (e.g., property, systems, processes, equipment, and employees)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazardous materials management requirements (e.g., storage, labeling, compatibility, disposal, spill response)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with hazardous energy sources

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with working in hot or cold environments (e.g., heat stress, cold stress)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hierarchy of controls (e.g., elimination, substitution, engineering, administrative, personal protective equipment [PPE])

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Safety systems/interlocks (e.g., electrical systems, critical support systems, robotics)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with working around pressurized systems (e.g., steam systems, hydraulic systems)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Unique workplace hazards (e.g., combustible dust, spray booths, dip tanks)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Confined space requirements (e.g., identification, permits, entry, rescue)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with working at heights or on elevated work platforms (e.g., fall prevention and protection methods; aerial lift, scaffolding, lifts; ladders)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with walking/working surfaces (e.g., slips, trips, and falls; stairways)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: The requirements for operating and inspecting material handling equipment/trucks, including forklifts (e.g., checklists, certifications, competencies, pedestrian safety, battery charging stations)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with hand and power tools (e.g., hammers, grinders)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with working around moving parts and pinch points (e.g., machine guarding, pulleys)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with housekeeping (e.g., materials storage, clutter, staging, fire hazards)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with hot work (e.g., welding, burning, cutting, grinding)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Safety operations associated with cranes and lifting devices (e.g., pre-operation inspection, checking manufacturer use standards, chain fall, load ratings)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Safety procedures associated with hoisting and rigging (e.g., inspection of rigging equipment, load limitations of rigging, use of tag lines)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Personal protective equipment (PPE), including types, selection, proper use, storage, maintenance, and inspection

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Electrical safe work practices (e.g., arc flash protection, temporary power cord safety, ground fault circuit interrupter [GFCI])

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with excavations (e.g., depth, distance, barricades, spoil pile location, basic soil classifications, access and egress)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Safety practices associated with motor vehicle operation (e.g., seat belts, loading docks, chocking of wheels, defensive driving)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Safety practices associated with heavy equipment operation (e.g., front-end loaders, backhoes, excavators)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with compressed gas storage and use (e.g., fuel gas, oxygen storage, ammonia tanks, liquefied petroleum gas cylinders)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with radiation (e.g., types of radiation, half-life calculations, time-distance and shielding, inverse square law, waste disposal)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with using technology while working (e.g., distraction caused by use of personal electronic devices, proximity alarm systems, alarm fatigue)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic components of technical drawings (e.g., units of measurement)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic components of process flow diagrams (e.g., legend icons)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Hazard Identification and Control - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Fundamental building design and construction (e.g., blueprints, ventilation, lighting, layout, flooring, noise, floor load ratings, occupancy ratings)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic concepts in ergonomics (e.g., proper lifting techniques, cumulative trauma disorders, neutral posture, workspace design)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Lighting requirements for job tasks (e.g., lighting measurements and conversions)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Occupational illnesses (e.g., bloodborne pathogens, tuberculosis, dermatitis, hearing loss, asbestosis, silicosis, flu)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with noise (e.g., sound level calculations, hearing protection devices, engineering controls)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Respiratory hazards and controls (e.g., types of particulates and gases, cartridges and filters, types of respirators, pre-use requirements)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common occupational injuries (e.g., carpal tunnel, amputation, electrocution/shock, repetitive injuries, sprains or strains, lacerations)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Acute and chronic occupational exposures and control methods (e.g., latency periods)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hazards and controls associated with biological safety and containment (e.g., levels of lab containment, disposal, biosafety cabinets, ventilation, sharps management)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Stress-related conditions and responses (e.g., workplace violence, loss of consciousness)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic concepts of industrial hygiene sample and indicator media (e.g., colorimetric tubes, pH strips, cyclones)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Sampling equipment, applications, and limitations (e.g., light meters, sound level meters, gas meters, sample pumps, dosimeters)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: The difference between passive and active sampling equipment

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Health Hazards and Basic Industrial Hygiene - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Principles of medical surveillance and their relevance to health hazards

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Techniques for conducting and evaluating the effectiveness of exercises and drills

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Emergency equipment use, inspection, and required performance tests

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Organizational and community response plans and integration (e.g., mutual aid agreements, business continuity and community plans, community right-to-know)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Disaster/emergency response/crisis planning

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Emergency systems operations and limitations (e.g., critical equipment operation, types of sprinkler systems)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Appropriate selection and use of available emergency response equipment (e.g., fire extinguisher, respirators, decontamination)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Emergency response procedures or action plans (e.g., first aid, eye washes, safety showers, cardiopulmonary resuscitation [CPR], automated external defibrillator [AED], bloodborne pathogens, fire extinguishers, emergency exit and re-entry procedures)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: The incident command system (e.g., roles, structure, importance of )

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Agents that could be used in terrorist events, including chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear, and explosive agents

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Emergency Preparedness, Fire Prevention, and Security - Skill to:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Participate in emergency response drills and exercises

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic management principles of authority, responsibility, and accountability (e.g., chain of command, informal leadership)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: The most appropriate channels or methods for communicating various types of information

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Types of records that must be retained

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic conflict resolution techniques

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic concepts of adult learning theory

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Training delivery mediums and technologies (e.g., presentation media, online, classroom, hands-on)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Appropriate training for content and audience (e.g., on-the-job training, lecture, demonstration)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Methods to evaluate student retention of the learning objectives (e.g., quizzes/tests, skills demonstration)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Techniques for evaluating the quality of the training (e.g., surveys, observation)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Skill to:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Influence behavior related to safety (e.g., group dynamics, motivation strategies, coaching strategies)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Skill to:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Participate in organizational teams

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Skill to:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Effectively communicate (verbally and in writing) with internal and external stakeholders

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 6 - Organizational Communication and Training/Education - Skill to:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Develop and deliver effective presentations or trainings

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 7 - Ethics and Professional Conduct - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Obligation to ensure safety information is understood (e.g., provide interpreter or translated materials)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 7 - Ethics and Professional Conduct - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: BCSP Code of Ethics

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 7 - Ethics and Professional Conduct - Knowledge of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Protecting confidential information (e.g., privacy of medical and personally identifiable information, trade secrets)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 7 - Ethics and Professional Conduct - Skill to:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Apply concepts of BCSP Code of Ethics (e.g., obligation to report hazards, environmental, or safety issues; chain of custody of samples and specimens; ethics related to conducting audits)

ceterms:description: The OHST examination contains 200 multiple-choice items with four possible answers and only one correct answer.
ceterms:name: Occupational Health and Safety Technologist (OHST) Examination
